name: Solstice in black
description:
Solstice was inspired by the yin and yang pull between the Northern and Southern Hemispheres, the balancing of our longest and shortest days and nights.  I wanted to create a tangible outward manifestation that also incorporated the human desire and struggle for balance within ourselves.  To that end, Solstice was purposefully designed to be equal parts masculine and feminine; hard and soft; matte and shiny; quilted and smooth; warm and lightweight.  It is made to be both armour and fanfare, worn for adventures both day and night.

This hat is constructed using mill-end designer surplus fabrics: a stiff black Italian wool for the center section, accented with a textured soft leather-look Italian vinyl in black.  Solstice is both very lightweight and warm (road-tested in Chicago winter winds!), and super comfortable to wear.  I've tried something new by making it a fitted silhouette - no drawstrings or adjustability here, just beautiful streamlined minimalism.

Solstice is unlined with finished seaming, foldable and rollable to stuff into a pocket or purse.  But why would you do that?  It's too much fun to wear!

Custom sized: please provide your head measurement upon ordering.  

Hat arrives at your doorstep in a lovely box and includes illustrated wear instructions. Gift message may be included at no extra charge.

Dry clean only.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly MADE TO ORDER, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Game Changer in black and oxblood
description:
A dream of a hat that combines several classic styles in a very modern way. Wear the Game Changer all fall and winter while changing up your look everyday! Purposefully designed and engineered to be worn as a cap, a fedora, or a cloche and to be beautiful in any iteration. Black wool melton combined with an oxblood and gunmetal metallic chevron make this the perfect accessory to update your fall wardrobe. 

Handmade with great care and attention to detail using two beautiful Italian mill-end surplus fabrics: a gorgeous black wool melton, along with a stunning oxblood & silver metallic poly/nylon acrylic. Fully lined in silk. A black cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon drawstring allows you to adjust the size from 22" to 23" (55.88 cm to 58.42 cm).

Ribbon color happily changed at your request. 

Hat arrives at your doorstep in a lovely hatbox and includes illustrated wear instructions. Gift message may be included at no extra charge.

Dry clean only.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly MADE TO ORDER, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Upswing in oatmeal heather wool
description:
Upswing is a sleek, sophisticated combination of a beanie, skullcap, fitted beret and turban. 

Soft and warm in a beautiful Italian knit wool jersey with a slightly nubby texture in an oatmeal heather color, it's the perfect hat to grab & go, or keep stashed in your purse for whenever the weather changes. 

Wear throughout the day and into the night with both causal and dressy ensembles. 

Super chic when worn as an extra layer under other more structured hats.

Also terrific for running, biking (fits great under a helmet), and other sporty pursuits! 

Pictured are just a few of the many ways that this women's hat is designed to be worn. 

Handmade with great care and attention to detail using a100% wool Italian mill-end surplus knit jersey. 

This hat is unlined.

Made to fit head sizes from 22" to 24" (55.88 cm to 60.96 cm).

Hat arrives at your doorstep in a lovely box with style guide and care instructions. Gift message may be included at no extra charge.

Hand wash, dry flat.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly MADE TO ORDER, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

name: Fedora Courant in chocolate brown & multi tweed
description:
Menswear inspired headwear for women! Fedora Courant is a convertible hat that transforms from a fedora to a cloche, to a modern toque - all while keeping you warm & stylish. It has been designed and engineered to be worn many different ways, and to look great in any form. It has a smaller, snappier brim than my Fedorable style, but offers equal versatility and chic - perfect for pairing with the larger collars & scarves that come with fall & winter fashion. Shown in a beautiful combination of chocolate brown wool melton, contrasted by a delicious chocolate brown, teal blue & green wool blend tweed boucle. 

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this convertible hat can be worn. 

Completely handmade by me from my own original design and pattern, using two beautiful Italian designer mill-end surplus fabrics - a chocolate brown wool melton, and a chocolate brown, teal blue & green wool blend boucle. Hand finished and fully lined in; contrasting color topstitching. Teal blue cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon tied in a bow, acts as a drawstring that provides size adjustment from 22" to 23" (55.9 cm to 58.4 cm). Ribbon and/or topstitching color can be happily changed at your request.

Dry clean only.

Arrives in a lovely hatbox and includes styling guide.

name: Fedorable in brown & white
description:
A fedora, a cloche, and more! You'll adore how this hat transforms from edgy to sweet - a chic accompaniment to both menswear-inspired and flirty, feminine looks.

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this convertible hat can be worn. 

Handmade from my own original design and pattern, using a beautiful mill-end surplus French grosgrain cotton in chocolate brown, textured throughout with white stitches; hand finished and fully lined in silk (a cotton lining may be substituted if you wish); matching chocolate topstitching on the brim; white cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon drawstring provides an adjustable size from 22" to 23" (55.9 cm to 58.4 cm). Ribbon and/or topstitching color happily changed at your request.

Other sizes available for an additional fee - please contact me prior to purchasing for measuring instructions and pricing.

Dry clean only.

Arrives in lovely hatbox and includes styling instructions.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Womens pink rain hat : Salmagundi in rainwear
description:
Womens pink rain hat : Salmagundi in rainwear

A fun and feminine rain hat with lots of styling options. Perfect for April showers and beyond, this hat made of a pearl pink rainwear fabric, is a happy and fashionable way to stay dry & look great! A rounded crown with detailed seaming, paired with a convertible and moldable brim, are the secret ingredients that allow you to convert the Salmagundi from a cloche, to a bowler, to anything in between. 

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this convertible hat can be worn. 

Handmade from my own original design and pattern, using a beautiful mill-end surplus water resistant coated cotton & linen canvas in a lovely pearl pink; hand finished and fully lined in silk (a cotton lining may be substituted if you wish); matching pale pink topstitching on the brim. The pastel pink cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon bow is actually a drawstring that allows you to adjust the size from 21.5" - 22.5" (54.61cm - 57.15cm). Ribbon and/or topstitching color happily changed at your request.

Other sizes available for an additional fee - please contact me prior to purchasing for measuring instructions and pricing.

Spot clean or dry clean only.

Arrives in lovely hatbox and includes styling instructions.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Heady Concoction in navy & black
description:
* asymmetrical split brim cloche
* multifunctional - designed to be worn many different ways
* adjustable size - from 21.5" - 22.5" (54.61 cm - 57.15 cm)
* handmade using an Italian mill-end surplus rayon & acetate blend in a gorgeous navy blue with black raised polka dots - simply luscious feel & texture!
* fully lined in silk 
* black cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon drawstring (color happily changed at your request) 
* dry clean only
* arrives in lovely hatbox and includes illustrated wear instructions

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to 7 days for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchase and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.  

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Salmagundi in houndstooth ultrasuede
description:
Convertible hat adjustable size : houndstooth ultrasuede Salmagundi
A lovely women's hat that converts from a cloche, to a bowler, to a large brimmed cap, Salmagundi features detailed seaming which provides structure, beauty and versatility.

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this hat is designed to be worn. Handmade with a gorgeous mill-end surplus ultrasuede (faux suede) in a snazzy chocolate brown and beige houndstooth pattern; fully lined with silk. Chocolate brown grosgrain ribbon detail acts as a drawstring to adjust hat from 21.5" - 22.5" (54.61cm - 57.15cm). Ribbon color can happily be changed at your request.

Dry clean only.

Hat arrives in lovely hatbox and includes wear and care instructions.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to 7 days for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchase and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Ripple Effect in espresso
description:
Ripple Effect is a floppy wide brimmed wool hat. It features a rounded crown shaped by detailed seaming, and an asymmetric brim with rows of topstitching that allow it to be molded many different ways and still hold its shape. Casual sophistication at every turn!

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this hat, is designed to be worn. Handmade with a beautiful espresso brown colored Italian mill-end surplus wool melton; fully lined with silk. Olive green grosgrain ribbon detail acts as a drawstring to adjust hat from 21.5" - 22.5" (54.61cm - 57.15cm). Ribbon color can happily be changed at your request.

Dry clean only.

Hat arrives in lovely hatbox and includes wear and care instructions.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to 7 days for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchase and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Heady Concoction in blue gray
description:
A women's wool cloche hat with an asymmetrical split brim (one side of the brim is curved, one side is squared off). Wear as a stylish alternative to a baseball cap, a high fashion modern turban, or an ear warming cloche. Designed to be close-fitting, also works great under a bicycle helmet!

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this hat, the Heady Concoction, is designed to be worn. Handmade with a beautiful blue grey heather Italian mill-end surplus wool; fully lined with silk. Black grosgrain ribbon detail acts as a drawstring to adjust hat from 21.5" - 22.5" (54.61cm - 57.15cm). Ribbon color can happily be changed at your request.

Dry clean only.

Hat arrives in lovely hatbox and includes wear and care instructions.

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to 7 days for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchase and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.  

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.

name: Harbinger in indigo denim
description:
This hat is a lovely combination of a cloche and a bucket hat, and with a larger brim for better sun protection and versatility. A slightly taller crown balances out the silhouette, and makes Harbinger high on style, while also being perfect for beach, garden, or all around town!

Pictured are just a few of the many ways this convertible hat is designed to be worn. 

Handmade from my own original design and pattern, using a European mill-end surplus cotton denim in deep indigo blue; hand finished and fully lined in silk (cotton also available at your request); orchid pink contrast topstitching; matching cotton & rayon grosgrain ribbon drawstring provide an adjustable size from 22" to 23.5" (55.88 cm to 59.69 cm). Ribbon and/or topstitching color happily changed at your request.

Dry clean only.

Arrives in lovely hatbox and includes illustrated wear instructions

PLEASE NOTE: The model pictured is wearing a sample. Your hat will be freshly made to order, especially for you. Please allow up to one week for your hat to be made. If you are in a rush and need it faster, please contact me prior to purchasing and I will make every effort to meet your deadline.

Orders shipping to IL will be charged sales tax.
